input_text:
Job Title: Mechanical Assembly

Location: St Cloud, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
_*Come work for a great company that truly cares about its team. Geringhoff has been family owned and operated for 142 years and was built on a foundation of treating each member of our organization like family, not just employees. At Geringhoff, we pride ourselves on helping make a difference by building top-of-the-line harvest equipment that helps feed the world. Join our family and enjoy great benefits, a fun work environment, and the opportunity to be a part of feeding the world in a career with a company that cares!*_

Position Summary:*

Geringhoff is seeking Mechanical Assembly candidates for 2nd shift. Assembly candidates will assist with assembling/building of farm machinery including cornhead and/or draper machines using blueprint reading, hand tools and power tools.

Primary Responsibilities:* Must be able to read blue prints, and assemble per work instructions. Must keep their workstation organized and orderly, and make sure that production parts, tools, test equipment and documentation are properly store and maintained. Follow the targets and deadlines set for department. Follow all safety procedures, environmental guidelines and company rules and regulations. Must perform other tasks as requested by department head.Required Education And Experience:* High school diploma or equivalent. 1+ years of Assembly experience preferred. Mechanical experience is preferred. Initial training on day shift for approximately 1 month before transitioning into night shift.Knowledge, Skills And Abilities:* Must be able to operate power, pneumatic and hand tools. Must have knowledge of hydraulic and electrical systems. Must be able to use overhead crane systems. Must be a self-starter, and be a “team player”. Must be quality conscious. Computer knowledge is helpful Must pass pre-employment screening.Geringhoff Benefits:* Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance with HSA/with employer HSA contribution Life Insurance and Voluntary Life Insurance Short-term disability 401k retirement plan/with company match Paid time off Uniforms 9 Paid Holidays Safety shoe & eyewear reimbursement Bonus Potential Clean and friendly work environment

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: $14.74 - $20.00 per hour

Benefits:

 401(k) 401(k) matching Dental insurance Health insurance Health savings account Life insurance Paid time off Referral program Vision insurance

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Pay: $19.00 - $30.00 per hour

Benefits:

 401(k) matching Flexible schedule Health insurance Health savings account Life insurance Paid time off Referral program Vision insurance

Compensation Package:

 Bonus opportunities

Schedule:

 4 hour shift 8 hour shift Day shift Evening shift Monday to Friday Night shift

Work Setting:

 In-person

Experience:

 Assembly: 1 year (Preferred) Mechanical knowledge: 1 year (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Mechanical Assembly
output_json.summary: Join a family-owned company with a history of 142 years, known for its commitment to its employees and the production of high-quality agricultural equipment.
job_responsibilities: Assemble farm machinery including cornhead and/or draper machines
Read blueprints and assemble according to work instructions
Maintain an organized and orderly workstation
Store and maintain production parts, tools, test equipment, and documentation
Adhere to safety procedures, environmental guidelines, and company rules and regulations
output_json.company_information: Geringhoff is a family-owned and operated company with a history of 142 years, dedicated to providing top-of-the-line harvest equipment to help feed the world.

other.content: 401(k) matching, Flexible schedule, Health insurance, Health savings account, Life insurance, Paid time off, Referral program, Vision insurance
4 hour shift, 8 hour shift, Day shift, Evening shift, Monday to Friday, Night shift
